title: Chiropractor Recommended Supplements | Tacoma, WA
description: Supplement Recommendations in Tacoma, WA. Call Tacoma Chiropractic Health Connection today at (253) 396-1000 for an appointment.
cleaned_text: Supplement Recommendations Our doctors have created custom supplement recommendations for you based on the frequently seen conditions in our clinic. Each link below explains the condition's goal, the supplements and dosage you should take, any additional recommendations, and a breakdown of the ordering process. We hope that you find these protocols helpful in making your nutritional supplement decisions.
